amendment.description: Strike section 8127 (page 122, lines 6 through 9), relating to military musical units.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 8127, which limits military bands to $200M.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Carter.
